anya-e0903n0:459_0: Punappunaṁ ceva vapanti bījaṁ, punappunaṁ vassati deva rājā;
anya-e0903n0:460_0: Punappunaṁ khettaṁ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṁ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:461_0: Punappunaṁ yācakā yācayanti, punappunaṁ dānapatī dadanti;
anya-e0903n0:462_0: Punappunaṁ dānapatī daditvā, punappunaṁ saggamupeti ṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:463_0: Punappunaṁ khīranikā duhanti, punappunaṁ vaccho upeti mātaraṁ;
anya-e0903n0:464_0: Punappunaṁ kilamati phandati ca, punappunaṁ gabbhamupeti mando.
anya-e0903n0:465_0: Punappunaṁ jāyati mīyati ca, punappunaṁ sivathikaṁ haranti;
anya-e0903n0:466_0: Maggañca laddhā apunabbhavāya, na punappunaṁ jāyati bhūripañño-hu–
anya-e0903n0:468_0: Pucchā – mātuposakasuttaṁ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:469_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante mātuposakaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:469_2: Mātuposako bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama dhammena bhikkhaṁ pariyesāmi,
anya-e0903n0:469_4: kaccāhaṁ bho gotama evaṁkārī kiccakārī homī”ti,
anya-e0903n0:469_5: tasmiṁ bhante vatthusmiṁ “taggha tvaṁ brāhmaṇa evaṁkārī kiccakārī hosi,
anya-e0903n0:469_6: yo kho brāhmaṇa dhammena bhikkhaṁ pariyesati,
anya-e0903n0:469_8: bahuṁ so puññaṁ pasavatī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:470_0: Yo mātaraṁ vā pitaraṁ vā, macco dhammena posati;
anya-e0903n0:472_0: Idheva naṁ pasaṁsanti, pecca sagge pamodati–
anya-e0903n0:474_2: sammāsambuddhena brāhmaṇasaṁyutte khomadussasuttaṁ kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.

anya-e0903n0:478_0: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṁ;
anya-e0903n0:483_0: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṁ;
anya-e0903n0:488_1: vaṅgīsasaṁyutte panāvuso catutthaṁ saṁṅgītaṁ ānandasuttaṁ katthakaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:489_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ vaṅgīsattheraṁ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:489_2: Āyasmatā bhante vaṅgīso āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:495_0: Saṅkhāre parato passa, dukkhato mā ca attato;
anya-e0903n0:501_0: Evaṁ kho bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:506_0: Saṅkhāre paratopassa, dukkhato mā ca attato;
anya-e0903n0:513_0: Pucchā – tattha āvuso dvādasamaṁ vaṅgīsasuttaṁ kattha kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:514_1: sāvatthiyaṁ bhante āyasmatā vaṅgīsattherena acira arahattappattena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṁvedinā–
anya-e0903n0:517_0: So me dhamma madesesi, khandhāyatana dhātuyo;
anya-e0903n0:519_0: Bahunnaṁ vata atthāya, bodhiṁ ajjhagamā muni;
anya-e0903n0:521_0: Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
anya-e0903n0:522_0: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ;
anya-e0903n0:530_0: Bahunnaṁ vata atthāya, bodhiṁ ajjhagamā muni;
anya-e0903n0:532_0: Svāgataṁ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
anya-e0903n0:533_0: Tasso vijjā anuppattā, kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:538_1: vanasaṁyutte panāvuso pañcamaṁ saṁgītaṁ ānandasuttaṁ kadā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kena kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:539_1: kosalesu bhante aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe aciraparinibbute bhagavati āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ ārabbha tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:539_2: Āyasmā bhante ānando aciraparinibbute bhagavati ativelaṁ gihisaññattibahulo viharati,
anya-e0903n0:544_0: Evaṁ kho bhante vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya āyasmato ānandattherassa anukampikāya atthakāmāya bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:545_0: Rukkhamūla gahanaṁ pasakkiya, nibbānaṁ hadayasmiṁ opiya;
anya-e0903n0:546_0: Jhāya gotama mā pamādo, kiṁ te biḷibiḷikā karissati-hu–
anya-e0903n0:549_1: yakkhasaṁyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṁ saṁgītaṁ indakasuttaṁ bhagavatā kattha kaṁ ārabbha kismiṁ vatthusmiṁ kathañca bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:550_1: rājagahe bhante indakūṭe pabbate indakassa yakkhassa bhavane indakaṁ yakkhaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:550_2: Indako bhante yakkho attavādo bhagavantaṁ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:557_0: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesi nibbattatī ghano;
anya-e0903n0:558_0: Ghanā pasākhā jāyanti, kesā lomā nakhāpica;
anya-e0903n0:559_0: Yañcassa bhuñjatī mātā, annaṁ pānañca bhojanaṁ;

anya-e0903n0:564_1: āḷaviyaṁ bhante āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane āḷavakaṁ yakkhaṁ ārabbha bhāsitaṁ.
anya-e0903n0:564_2: Āḷavako bhante yakkho bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:575_0: Na khvāhaṁ taṁ āvuso nikkhamissāmi, yaṁ te karaṇīyaṁ, taṁ karohi,
anya-e0903n0:577_0: Kiṁ sūkha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ, kiṁ su suciṇṇaṁ sukhamāvahāti;
anya-e0903n0:578_0: Kiṁ su have sādubharaṁ rasānaṁ, kathaṁ jīviṁ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṁ–
anya-e0903n0:579_0: Saddhīdha vittaṁ purisassa seṭṭhaṁ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
anya-e0903n0:580_0: Saccaṁ have sādutaraṁ rasānaṁ, paññājīviṁ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṁ;

anya-e0903n0:586_0: Kathaṁsu kittiṁ pappoti, kathaṁ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0903n0:587_0: Asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ, kathaṁ pecca na socati–
anya-e0903n0:591_0: Saccena kittiṁ pappoti, dadaṁ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0903n0:592_0: Asmā lokā paraṁ lokaṁ, evaṁ pecca na socati;
anya-e0903n0:594_0: Saccaṁ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve peccana socati–
